content.query:
-- stored procedures
-- to write data
USE nyc_taxi_ldw

GO

CREATE VIEW silver.vw_trip_data_green AS
SELECT
    trip_data.*,
    trip_data.filepath(1) AS year,
    trip_data.filepath(2) AS month
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'silver/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS trip_data;
